data.oai_dc:dc: Counts of trimmed 36 bp reads that mapped uniquely to the coordinates of 2509 well-documented long-intergenic non-coding lincRNAs (Khalil et al., Many human large intergenic noncoding RNAs associate with chromatin-modifying complexes and affect gene expression. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A 106: 11667-11672, 2009).
